title: Remove Docs and Learn More sections from UI/navigation

requirements.summary: Remove the Docs link from the primary header navigation and mobile drawer navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: The header navigation no longer contains a link labeled "Docs".
The mobile navigation drawer no longer contains a link labeled "Docs".
No other navigation links (Home, Report Issue, My Reports, Official Dashboard, Escalated Issues) are removed or renamed as part of this change.

file_operations.description: Remove the "Docs" nav item (the Link to "/docs") from the shared NavLinks block so it disappears from both the desktop header navigation and the mobile Sheet/drawer navigation, without changing any other existing nav links.

requirements.summary: Remove the Learn More CTA/link from the landing page hero so it no longer routes users to docs.
acceptanceCriteria: The landing page hero no longer shows a button/link labeled "Learn More".
The remaining primary CTA in the hero (e.g., "Report an Issue" when authenticated or "Get Started" when not authenticated) still renders and works.

file_operations.description: Remove the hero-area secondary CTA Button/Link that points to "/docs" and is labeled "Learn More", leaving the primary CTA logic and layout intact.

requirements.summary: Remove the /docs route registration so documentation is no longer reachable through in-app routing.
acceptanceCriteria: The router no longer registers a route at path "/docs".
Navigating to "/docs" does not render the documentation content page (e.g., it should not resolve to the DocsPage component).

file_operations.description: Remove the docs route definition (createRoute with path "/docs"), remove its inclusion from the route tree, and remove the DocsPage import so the router no longer registers "/docs" and cannot resolve it to DocsPage.
